mapper.select: SELECT id i_id, Org_ID i_org_Id,Proportion_Code str_proportion_Code,Product_ID i_product_Id,Remarks str_remarks,Operator str_operator,Create_Date str_create_Date,Modifier str_modifier,Modify_Date str_modify_Date,Valid_Flag i_valid_Flag,Upload i_upload FROM Asph_TargetProportion WHERE Product_ID =#{i_product_Id} and Org_ID=#{i_org_Id} and Valid_Flag= 1

SELECT a.id i_id,a.Grad_Id i_grad_Id,o.Org_Name str_org_Name,a.Targ_PropID as i_targ_PropId,a.Proportion_Code str_proportion_Code,v.Material_Name str_material_Name, v.Material_Model str_material_Model,a.Remarks str_remarks, a.Modify_Date str_modify_Date,a.Create_Date str_create_Date, ag.Grade_Code str_grade_Code, pp.proportion_Code str_Mproportion_Code, v.Material_Name+'-'+v.Material_Model materNameAndModel, a.operator str_operator FROM Asphalt_Prod_Proportion a LEFT JOIN Organization_Info o ON a.Org_ID = o.Id LEFT JOIN V_MaterialInfo v ON v.Id = a.Product_ID LEFT JOIN Asphalt_Grading ag ON ag.Id = a.Grad_Id LEFT JOIN Asph_TargetProportion pp ON pp.Id = a.Targ_PropID WHERE 1=1
AND v.material_Name like '%${str_material_Name}%'
AND v.material_Model like '%${str_material_Model}%'
AND a.Proportion_Code like '%${str_proportion_Code}%'
#{item}
AND a.Valid_Flag=1 ORDER BY a.id DESC
select pp.Targ_PropID,p.Prod_ID,p.Grad_Id from Production_Plan p left join Asphalt_Prod_Proportion pp on pp.Id = p.Prod_ID where p.Prod_ID = #{i_id} and p.Valid_Flag = 1 and p.IsCancel = 0

SELECT a.Proportion_Code str_proportion_Code, v.Material_Name str_material_Name, v.Material_Model str_material_Model, a.Create_Date str_create_Date, a.Modify_Date str_modify_Date, a.No1_SetValue d_no1_SetValue, a.No2_SetValue d_no2_SetValue, a.No3_SetValue d_no3_SetValue, a.No4_SetValue d_no4_SetValue, a.No5_SetValue d_no5_SetValue, a.No6_SetValue d_no6_SetValue, a.HotPowder_SetValue d_hotPowder_SetValue, a.Asphalt_SetValue d_asphalt_SetValue, a.Remarks str_remarks, a.ColdPowder_SetValue d_coldPowder_SetValue, a.Admixture1_SetValue d_admixture1_SetValue, a.Admixture2_SetValue d_admixture2_SetValue, a.Product_ID i_product_Id, a.Grad_Id, a.id i_id, g.Grade_Code Grade_Code FROM Asphalt_Prod_Proportion a left join V_MaterialInfo v on a.Product_ID = v.Id left join Asph_TargetProportion t on t.Id = a.Targ_PropID left join Asphalt_Grading g on g.Id = a.Grad_Id
WHERE a.Org_ID =#{i_org_Id} and a.id =#{i_id} ;
SELECT id i_id from Asph_TargetProportion WHERE Valid_Flag =1 and Org_ID =#{i_org_Id} AND Proportion_Code =#{str_proportion_Code}
SELECT id i_id FROM Asphalt_Prod_Proportion a WHERE a.Proportion_Code =#{str_proportion_Code} AND a.Org_ID =#{i_org_Id} and a.Valid_Flag =1
SELECT id i_id FROM Asphalt_Prod_Proportion a WHERE a.Targ_PropID =#{i_product_Id} and a.Valid_Flag =1
mapper.insert: insert into Asphalt_Prod_Proportion (Remarks, Org_ID, Proportion_Code, Targ_PropID, Grad_Id, Product_ID, No1_SetValue,No2_SetValue,No3_SetValue,No4_SetValue,No5_SetValue,No6_SetValue,No7_SetValue,No8_SetValue,Admixture1_SetValue, Admixture2_SetValue,HotPowder_SetValue,ColdPowder_SetValue,Asphalt_SetValue,Operator,Create_Date) VALUES (#{str_remarks}, #{i_org_Id}, #{str_proportion_Code}, #{i_targ_PropId}, #{str_grade_Code}, #{i_product_Id}, #{d_no1_SetValue},#{d_no2_SetValue},#{d_no3_SetValue},#{d_no4_SetValue},#{d_no5_SetValue},#{d_no6_SetValue},#{d_no7_SetValue}, #{d_no8_SetValue},#{d_admixture1_SetValue},#{d_admixture2_SetValue},#{d_hotPowder_SetValue},#{d_coldPowder_SetValue},#{d_asphalt_SetValue},#{str_operator},CONVERT(varchar(100),GETDATE(), 20))
